name: E-Bike Rebate
description: Up to $2,000 point-of-sale discount for new electric bicycle
fullDescription: The California Air Resources Board (CARB) E-Bike Incentive Project provides substantial point-of-sale discounts for income-qualified residents to purchase new electric bicycles.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $2,000 instant discount on new e-bike
- Point-of-sale reduction (no waiting for rebate)
- Covers standard and cargo e-bikes
- Additional for adaptive e-bikes
- Available at participating retailers
- Vouchers released in rounds
howToGetIt:
1. Sign up for email notifications on CARB website
2. When vouchers available, apply online quickly
3. Meet income eligibility (typically 300% federal poverty level)
4. Receive voucher code if selected
5. Use voucher at participating e-bike retailer
6. Discount applied at checkout
